Type.Name: ISymbolBinder

TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISymbolBinder

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

block.para: This interface is the managed counterpart of the ISymUnmanagedBinder interface, which is one of the unmanaged symbol store interfaces that provide an alternate way to read and write debug symbol information.

summary.para: Represents a symbol binder for managed code.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolReader GetReader (int importer, string filename, string searchPath);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolReader GetReader(int32 importer, string filename, string searchPath) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This interface is not 64-bit clean. Use ISymbolBinder1 instead")

remarks.para: When given a metadata interface, a file name, and a search path, the method returns the interface that reads the debugging symbols associated with the module.

summary.para: Gets the interface of the symbol reader for the current file.

returns.para: The interface that reads the debugging symbols.

Docs.param: The name of the file for which the reader interface is required.
The search path used to locate the symbol file.
